page.title: 08Shops In Dent.
page.content: There are only a few shops in Dent a mini_supermarket,post office,antique shop,caving equipment and craft come knitting shop. The mini_supermarket sells all kinds of food,fresh,frozen,dried and tinned. It also sells fruit,vegetables washing powders,fresh bread and pies,also fancy goods. Dent post office sells stamps etc; sweets,post cards of local views,news papers,magazines and mementos of Dent. Antiques of all kinds can be found in the antique shop,including furniture some of which has been tastefully altered by the local carpenter. The Knitters Of Dent is where wool from many foreign countries can be purchased;a craft persons delight. Walking and caving gear is on sale in The National Caving Centre.
